definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Every time I call you, I got your administrative assistant.
sentences.chinese: 每次我給你打電話，都是你的助手接。

sentences.english: Helper classes allow you to add functionality to your test scripts.
sentences.chinese: 助手類允許您將功能添加到您的測試腳本中。

sentences.english: Nostradamus , his son, and his assistant set the whole thing up.
sentences.chinese: 諾查丹馬斯，他的兒子，和助手策劃了整個事件。

sentences.english: The Xerox is a good office assistant, which you never get tired of using.
sentences.chinese: 靜電覆印機，文祕好助手，百用不厭。

sentences.english: She's always palming the worst jobs off on her assistant.
sentences.chinese: 她總是哄騙她的助手做最無聊的工作。

sentences.english: My assistants were hanging over the edge of the pool with plugged-in strobes .
sentences.chinese: 我的助手們拿着插入式電源閘擠在游泳池邊上。

sentences.english: The assistant folder can be placed on the left of the shelf or the right.
sentences.chinese: 助手夾可放在置物架的左側或者右側。

sentences.english: Biro claimed to me that an assistant had given him permission to take it.
sentences.chinese: 比羅則向我聲稱是一位助手允許他拿走火柴。

sentences.english: It with make the sound machine pedal similar, is good assistant of necessary performer.
sentences.chinese: 它與制音器踏板一樣，是演奏者不可或缺的好助手。

sentences.english: Then he distributed leaflets to the other assistants to explain the action program.
sentences.chinese: 然後他散發傳單給其他助手來解釋行動方案。

sentences.english: Baroness a lawyer assistant to propose to esser, but was refused.
sentences.chinese: 男爵夫人的一名律師助手向艾瑟求婚，但是被拒絕了。

sentences.english: Unitron is a global producer of hearing aides.
sentences.chinese: 優利康聽力助手是一個全球生產。

sentences.english: How do I use the Crash Helper to troubleshoot blue screen errors and crashes?
sentences.chinese: 我如何使用崩潰助手解決藍屏錯誤和崩潰？

sentences.english: You must be Mr. Professor's assistant.
sentences.chinese: 你一定是王教授的助手吧？

sentences.english: Obama and his personal aide Reggie Love relax on board.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬與他的私人助手在火車上休息。

definition: to replace/to take over (a position or post)
to take over (from those working the previous shift)/to take over (in a leadership role etc)/to succeed sb
to take over (as minister, manager etc)
to lead a group/leader of a group/captain (of sports squad)
